title: 跟工程师讨论优先级
situation: Sprint planning with engineers. Discussing if a feature can be done in two weeks.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 这个需求两週能做完吗？
turns.pinyin: Zhège xūqiú liǎng zhōu néng zuò wán ma?
turns.translation: Can we finish this requirement in two weeks?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 可以，但我们需要先确认技术方案。
turns.pinyin: Kěyǐ, dàn wǒmen xūyào xiān quèrèn jìshù fāng'àn.
turns.translation: Yes, but we need to confirm the technical approach first.
suggestions: 可以，但我们需要先确认技术方案。
能做，但要先过一下技术方案。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 技术方案週二能出来吗？
turns.pinyin: Jìshù fāng'àn zhōu'èr néng chūlái ma?
turns.translation: Can the technical design be ready by Tuesday?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 週二下午可以给初版，我们週三一起过。
turns.pinyin: Zhōu'èr xiàwǔ kěyǐ gěi chū bǎn, wǒmen zhōusān yīqǐ guò.
turns.translation: We can have a first draft Tuesday afternoon, let's review together Wednesday.
suggestions: 週二下午可以给初版，我们週三一起过。
週二能给初版，週三过一下。
